name: Bounce:Stories First Demo
description:
The first demo of this Fan-Game created by fans based on the abandoned and nostalgic Bounce saga.

In this game, you can play three type of levels: Test Levels, Community Levels, and Parkour Levels. This game is an simple plataform game in-development.

If you want to help this project, you have questions, or you found bugs, please contact me in the comments, my Discord , or my email.

Credits:
